name: Amexio Window
description: Window Pane component is a customizable Modal Pane in which user can enter custom content

properties.name: footer-align
properties.description: Alignment of footer contents to right or left.

properties.name: vertical-position
properties.description: Alignment of window dialog to top or bottom or center.

properties.name: horizontal-position
properties.description: Alignment of window dialog to left or right or center.

properties.name: show
properties.description: uses two way binding to Show / Hide Window.

properties.name: material-design
properties.description: user doesn't want header background color then user can use  material-design is equal to true

properties.name: close-on-escape
properties.description: Window box closes on click of Escape Key.

properties.name: body-height
properties.description: Assign body height in percentage, in case of maximize=true it will be set to 100% by default

properties.name: maximize
properties.description: User can maximize the window to full screen.

properties.name: header
properties.description: it is flag that decides header visibility

properties.name: footer
properties.description: it is flag that decides footer visibility

properties.name: context-menu
properties.description: Context Menu provides the Window on right click(for Array structure: refer typescript code in source tab)

events.name: rightClick
events.description: It is fired when clicked on context menu providing Window node data and selected context menu data.
